entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as the one wearing pajamas and talking to Harry in the darkness.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who can see Ron's pajamas and questioning his identity.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as sorting books while Harry and Ron are talking.

entities.name: ghoul
entities.description: The ghoul is described as slimy and bald, but in this instance, it's hairy and has angry purple blisters.

relationships.description: Ron claims to be Harry, but Harry denies it.
Ron says the ghoul is going to come and live in his room.
Harry does not believe Ron's claim of being him.
Ron and Hermione are in the same room, but there is no direct interaction between them.
